titles.title: Investing in American Workers Act
Investing in American Workers Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit for employer-provided worker training.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
